name: Magic Overcharge
description:
entry for Mini Jam 34

In this game you control Zézim in his quest to become a PRO mage.

this game is one of that type of infinite "survive the horde" game, that starts easy as pie and after 1 minute playing you realize that you're on hell and can't survive more, but now with the extra challenge to balance your powers.

Hope you like it! :D
